# OpenCV-Threshold-Application
 Just making something with user interface
 - open certain img
 - BGR2GRAY
 - draw an rectangle and cut 
 - save picture
 - set threshold with scroll bar
 - calculate the rate of the threshold
 
***
 Requirement 
 - pyqt5 == 5.13.0
 - opencv-python == 3.4.1
 - numpy == 1.17.2
